sentences.en: Earthworms and other essential soil organisms are extremely susceptive to cadmium poisoning.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓和其他主要的土壤生物都非常容易镉中毒.

sentences.en: Processes with short time constants are fast and susceptive to process noise.
sentences.cn: 流程短在噪音进程中是快速和敏感的.

sentences.en: Resistance ratios to deltamethrin, beta - cypermethrin, cypermethrin, cyfluthrin and DDVP were ( 1.52 ) - ( 8.28 ) , but there are very susceptive to propoxue with resistance ratio ( 0.92 ) - ( 1.13 ).
sentences.cn: 对溴氰菊酯 、 高效氯氰菊酯 、 顺式氯氰菊酯 、 高效氟氯氰菊酯、敌敌畏已不同程度地产生抗性,抗性倍数在 1.52 ~8.28之间;对残杀威敏感, 抗性倍数在0.92~ 1.13 之间.

sentences.en: The ciliated larvae of these monogeneans moved about immediately after hatching and were susceptive to currents.
sentences.cn: 纤毛幼虫孵出后即开始活跃的运动,对水流敏感且对来自宿主鱼和非宿主鱼的组织有相似的趋向反应.

sentences.en: The sensor system using this stabilization method is susceptive to the disturbance and has a high cost.
sentences.cn: 该传感器系统的稳定使用此方法是敏感到的干扰和具有较高的成本。

words.tran_cn: 敏感的；感受性强的；易接受的

trans.tran_cn: 感受性强的，敏感的，有接受力的
